extendedInfo.description: Simple WiFi toggle widget (1x1).Allows you On/Off your WiFi with only 1 click.RE ADD WIDGET AFTER UPDATE!!!Check our OnOff Widgets Pack! All widgets in one with skin support!WRITE EMAIL WITH DETAILS IF SOMETHING NOT WORKING, DON'T WRITE USELESS COMMENTS

reviews.title: Nice & simple. Perfect.
reviews.comment: Love this excellent app.Essential for wifi users.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Freezes wifi
reviews.comment: Every once in a while it gets stuck and I can\'t turn on WiFi, even using normal settings. I have to force stop the app. This let\'s me turn on WiFi through normal settings but then the widget won\'t work at all. Had to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does Not Work
reviews.comment: I use this to disable WiFi but it does not work.  WIFI turns back on just as before.  This is of not use whatsoever
reviews.author: Thomas Riley

reviews.comment: What crap! Updated on A855 and now it freezes. Just did the same on my wifes 855. Buh-bye with it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work well anymore
reviews.comment: After you push the button you have to wait 30-60 seconds before it responds.
reviews.author: Shannon Daily

reviews.comment: Works great. If people would read the info on here they\'d realize after update u have to reinstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Widget disappears everytime the phone reboots and although it shows up in downloads you have to reinstall it every time. Dell streak 5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice little switch..much better looking than all the standard wi-fi toggles.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this; use it thoughout every day! Takes less screen real estate than most. Would love to have access from the Nofications bar. - 2.1 on CLIQ
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Installed it, then my wifi stopped working, uninstalled it now my wifi is working. Wouldnt recommend!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What a concept. A light switch for WiFi. No guess work. No battery drain. It\'s either on or off. You decide. Thanks for brilliant simplicity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it\'s supposed to do... however uninstalling because I just found the wifi widget on MT3GS/Espresso tucked away in some silly folder
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on V. Sam Gal. S4.
reviews.comment: No good. Will turn off wifi. Won\'t go back on. App \"stopped\".
reviews.author: Steve Salamin

reviews.comment: Much easier than going to settings to turn WiFi on/off, highly recommended
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great widget
reviews.comment: I have been using this and other Curve Fish widgets for years. Unfortunately, it keeps force closing itself with Jellybean 4.2.2 on Galaxy S4. Please fix if possible. Thanks!
reviews.author: Michael Raef

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Simple widget that informs first about the touchscreen pressing and then about the completed action.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and functional
reviews.comment: Brilliant tiny app that gives you a very simple on / off switch for your WiFi, also is a very quick way of seeing if your WiFi is off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Turns wifi back on every time you open browser. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine
reviews.comment: No problems with the operation, just loses a star as the widgets don\'t align correctly on screen. They align at the bottom of the grid cell, not central like all the others. HTC One X on 4.0.4.
reviews.author: Simon T

reviews.comment: Great, simple, runs on my home screen all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User
